entry.source: This is Hope. A demon has disguised itself{F801}as a human and is hiding within the city.{F801}If the citizens find out, there will be panic.{F801}I need this demon disposed of - quietly.{F801}If you believe you are up to this task, then{F801}stay vigilant while in the city. That is all.{F801}
